components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

incidents.name: Twilio Flex / TaskRouter Voice Orchestrator Affected

incident_updates.body:
Twilio Flex / TaskRouter Voice Orchestrator was degraded for 2 minutes between 14:01 and 14:03 Pacific Time on 04/03/2024. During this period of time High latency in Voice Orchestrator caused 5xxs in downstreams resulting in some impact to inbound and outbound meetings
Customer Impact:  Some inbound and outbound meetings would have failed, more impact to be provided after assessment. Likely 35 meetings impacted. The issue has now been resolved.Twilio Flex / Task Router Voice Orchestrator was degraded for 2 minutes between 14:01 and 14:03 Pacific Time on 04/03/2024. During this period of time High latency in Voice Orchestrator caused 5xxs in downstreams resulting in some impact to inbound and outbound meetings
Customer Impact:  Some inbound and outbound meetings would have failed, more impact to be provided after assessment. Likely less than 100 meetings impacted. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Multiple Networks in India for a Subset of Preregistered Sender IDs

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS towards multiple networks in India was degraded for 332 minutes between 3:10 a.m. and 8:42 a.m. Pacific Time on 04/03/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced SMS delivery failures towards multiple networks in India, when sending from preregistered alphanumeric sender IDs. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Failure to Retrieve Trial Phone Numbers during New Account Onboarding

incident_updates.body: The issue with provisioning trial phone numbers has been resolved and phone number provisioning is operating normally at this time.

Our engineers have identified that there were some numbers in bad state which were causing this issue for a select few instances during number instances. This is not something that is impacting our all customers. 

Phone Number Provisioning is operating normally. And we continue to monitor for system stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue unable to get trial phone numbers provisioned and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Messaging Billing Events Delayed for Some Messages

incident_updates.body: Following an internal incident, some messages sent between [Mar 26 2024 at 5:02 AM PDT and Mar 26 2024 at 5:32 PM PDT] will be billed with a delay of up to 48 hours.
